remarks: Ring addition operation for the constructed full vector space H. (Contributed by NM, 29-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvhfplusr.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvhfplusr.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfplusr.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfplusr.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvhfplusr.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` U ) $.
dvhfplusr.p $e |- .+ = ( s e. E , t e. E |-> ( f e. T |-> ( ( s ` f ) o. ( t ` f ) ) ) ) $.
dvhfplusr.s $e |- .+b = ( +g ` F ) $.
dvhfplusr $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) -> .+b = .+ ) $.
$d E s t $.
$d H f $.
$d K f s t $.
$d V f $.
$d W f s t $.
